text:
01 of 37 MILLENNIAL MOOD BOARD Ultrawig/Splash News Online Dion cemented her honorary forever young status proving she can pull off millennial pink better than pretty much everyone in the Gen Y cohort.

02 of 37 FASHION ROYALTY Splash News Online After months of high drama, high concept looks from the new reigning queen of fashion, Céline decided to give us something just straight up glamorous and truly befitting her recently appointed royal status.

03 of 37 INCOGNITO SNAKESKIN Law Roach/Instagram While National Snake Day and the anniversary of the #KimExposedTaylorParty has now come and gone, Céline decided to celebrate the pop culture milestone a few days late in a head-to-toe snakeskin ensemble.

04 of 37 A MAJOR DOSE OF DRAMA Splash News Online At this point, the singer's such a style pro she can wear five different dramatic statement pieces at once without ever worrying that all that drama will pull focus from the true star attraction.

05 of 37 HIGH-LOW DRESSING Splash News While most would pair this lush Reem Acra cocoon coat with an equally sumptuous evening gown, Céline is not most, perferring to pair the outerwear opulence with a simple (though no less pricey) Bottega Veneta sweatsuit.

06 of 37 MAD FOR PLAID Splash News If you thought head-to-toe plaid was just for school girls and Scots, let Céline show you how to take this print to new heights of fashion (with the help of Antonio Berardi and YSL, of course).

07 of 37 LUXE LEISURE Splash News While your off-duty look probably consists of a snuggie and sweats, Céline's Elie Saab jumpsuit and heels suggests you might want to seriously step up your leisurewear game.

08 of 37 GROUNDBREAKING FLORALS SplashNews This maxi might be enough to make even Miranda Priestly rethink her moratorium on the ubiquitous spring trend.

09 of 37 #1 FAN Splash News The singer knows you have to love yourself before you can love anyone else. But who wouldn't be their own number one fan when you look this fly every day?

10 of 37 CAPED CRUSADER SplashNews Céline prepares for her role as your fashion fairy godmother in this head to toe Ralph & Russo Fall 2016 Couture ensemble.

11 of 37 A LITTLE BIT ROCK 'N' ROLL Best Image/BACKGRID Lady-like bishop sleeves one day, rock 'n' roll Saint Laurent leather, Messika diamond earrings, and denim the next. There's clearly no look Céline can't totally kill.

12 of 37 STYLE GODDESS INSTARimages.com In case you were somehow still questioning her bonafide fashion diety status, we give you Exhibit 238 of the haute couture slayage.

13 of 37 VICTORIAN GARDENER, BUT MAKE IT FASHION Who knew turn of the century school marm clothes and a simple pair of gardening shears could look so chic? Céline knew.

14 of 37 SUNROOF SAVVY Philippe Blet/REX/Shutterstock The singer may have just pioneered an all new way to pose for the paps, taking a nonchalant stance out of her sunroof while still managing to show off her footwear and Messika diamonds.

15 of 37 HYPEBEAST SOPRANO Splash News Online Of course, Céline would find a way to put her own twist on the collection every hypebeast is currently fawning over, stepping out in head-to-toe Louis Vuitton x Supreme silk pajamas.

16 of 37 FLORAL KIMONO Splash News Online Dion served up some Eastern glamour in a kimono-esque Reem Acra dress accessorized with a big bejeweled belt and mini Gucci bag.

17 of 37 TIED WITH A BOW Mireya Acierto/GC Images Once again, Céline confirms that she is a fashionable gift unto the world in a Dice Kayek gingham blouse, Céline pants and a bag from her own forthcoming accessories collection.

18 of 37 NOTHING TO WEAR Vogue/Instagram Sometimes the biggest fashion statement you can make is when you wear nothing at all.

19 of 37 SCHIAPARELLI SPARKLES Denise Truscello/Vogue/Instagram The music legend even knows how to turn your standard showroom appointment into a Vogue caliber photo shoot, telling the magazine in regards to the paparazzi that follow her everywhere, "They see me; I don't see them."

20 of 37 SUMMER SUEDE Marc Piasecki/GC Images Sometimes you have to suffer for style, like when you decide to wear a full-on Balmain python trench coat and thigh-high suede boots on a 75-degree summer day.

21 of 37 GIAMBATTISTA VALLI COUTURE Splash News The singer was so thrilled to be at the show, she didn't just provide the paparazzi with her usual Vogue cover-caliber poses, she also danced through the halls of the Petit Palais and gave the designer a one-woman standing ovation afterwards.

22 of 37 HAUTE COUTURE CAR MODEL Splash News Céline knows that before saying you're "extra" or "too much" you have to ask yourself, if you're not sprawled across a car in the name of couture using the paps as your personal photographers, are you even doing enough?

23 of 37 STYLISH SWEATSUIT Joss Leclair/REX/Shutterstock Céline proved she can really pull off anything when she stepped out in Denmark in an oversize blue slogan Off-White tracksuit.

24 of 37 BIG CITY FARMER KCS Presse/MEGA If the faux leather Givenchy overalls, Céline top, and Hermès Himilayan Kelly bag weren't testament enough to the chicness of Céline, just take a gander at those Kanye West designed Giuseppe Zanotti heels famously worn in the past by none other than Kim Kardashian.

25 of 37 BALENCIAGA TREE POSE Splash News Sure, anyone could walk out of a hotel and bust into a yoga pose, but could they do it while wearing the latest Balenciaga sneakers?

26 of 37 TONY THE TIGER COUTURE MEGA Even when she's channeling her inner Tony the Tiger the singer looks super-chic.

27 of 37 MILLENNIAL PINK MONOCHROME Mehdi Taamallah/NurPhoto/Sipa USA She may not be a millennial, but her monochromatic pink game is on point in this Dice Kayek ensemble teamed with Casadei platforms, Dior sunglasses, and a matching YSL bag.

28 of 37 ALL FLORAL EVERYTHING Marc Piasecki/GC Why bother visiting the botanical gardens when you could simply feast your eyes on these layers upon layers of floral suiting (courtesy Roberto Cavalli)?

29 of 37 FASHUN FUN KCS Presse / MEGA Proof that there's no aesthetic Céline can't master, going from a springtime effusion of blooms to this edgy goth maximalist Balmain look over the course of a day.

30 of 37 RUFFLES AND METALLIC THIGH-HIGH BOOTS Dave J Hogan/Getty Céline doubles down on the drama in a ruffled top with a train and thigh-high metallic silver boots.

31 of 37 STYLE ANGEL Ethan Miller/Getty In case you needed a reminder that the singer is literally an angel incarnate, here she is in a plunging white Stéphane Rolland gown at this year's Billboard Music Awards.

32 of 37 MET GALA NOVICE Photo by Denise Truscello; Courtesy CelineDion/instagram The only thing chicer than Céline attending the Met Gala for the first time in custom Versace is Céline post-Met Gala eating a hot dog in said custom Versace.

33 of 37 GIFT WRAP GOWN Todd Williamson/Getty Images We always knew Céline Dion had a gift, but apparently we never realized that she also actually is one, as seen here in a Christian Siriano.

34 of 37 HEARTBREAKER Denise Truscello/WireImage The singer dressed to break hearts at the press conference for her first eponymous handbag and accessory collection.

35 of 37 GREEN GRAMMYS GOWN Lester Cohen/WireImage She embodied all of the finest elements of the snake emoji at the 2017 Grammy Awards in a glittering green Zuhair Murad dress.

36 of 37 OSCARS ICON Jim Smeal/WireImag But really Céline has long been a low-key fashion superstar, like this iconic turn on the Oscar's red carpet when she put Kriss Kross to shame at their own backwards dressing game in Dior by John Galliano white suit.
title: 37 Pictures That Prove Céline Dion Is the Style Icon the World Needs

meta_data.description: From wearing her tuxedo backwards to shutting down her first Met Gala red carpet, it seems Celine Dion can do no sartorial wrong
meta_data.sailthru.author: Emily Kirkpatrick
